import React from 'react'; import { useSpring, animated } from 'react-spring'; import '../App.css'; // Import your CSS file for styling const useWordAnimation = (word, index) => { return useSpring({ opacity: 1, transform: 'translateY(0px)', from: { opacity: 0, transform: 'translateY(20px)' }, delay: index * 100, // Adjust the delay to control the timing of each word }); }; const AnimatedWord = ({ word, index }) => { const props = useWordAnimation(word, index); return ( {word}{' '} ); }; const AnimatedIntroduction = () => { const text = [ "Portfolionaire,", "our", "dedicated", "resume", "website,", "is", "a", "dynamic", "tool", "catering", "specifically", "to", "the", "students", "of", "our", "class.", "This", "platform", "provides", "a", "centralized", "space", "for", "showcasing", "a", "comprehensive", "overview", "of", "skills,", "experiences,", "and", "achievements,", "empowering", "individuals", "to", "highlight", "their", "unique", "qualities.", "Its", "interactive", "features", "ensure", "a", "captivating", "user", "experience,", "fostering", "deeper", "engagement.", "Furthermore,", "Portfolionaire", "significantly", "boosts", "online", "visibility,", "optimizing", "searchability", "and", "discoverability", "in", "the", "digital", "realm.", "In", "essence,", "this", "platform", "stands", "as", "a", "strategic", "asset,", "delivering", "a", "modern,", "tailored,", "and", "impactful", "representation", "of", "each", "student's", "professional", "identity,", "ultimately", "enhancing", "their", "prospects", "in", "the", "competitive", "academic", "and", "professional", "landscape." ]; return (
{text.map((word, index) => ( ))}
); }; export default AnimatedIntroduction;
